metadata.title: Murphy Ben International | Global African Entertainment & Digital Distribution
metadata.description: MBI is the premier African content aggregator and digital distributor. From Nollywood streaming on Aforevo to Afrobeatz radio, we bridge the gap between African creativity and the global audience.

hero.heading: Amplifying African Voices to the World
hero.subheading: The leading digital architecture for African entertainment. We power the ecosystem of Nollywood streaming, Afrobeatz radio, and creator monetization through cutting-edge technology and global distribution networks.

items.title: Aforevo
items.description: The ultimate destination for Nollywood streaming. We curate and distribute thousands of hours of premium African movies to a global diaspora audience via YouTube and O&O platforms.

items.title: Music & Audio
items.description: Powering the rhythm of the continent. Our Afrobeatz radio and digital music distribution networks ensure African artists monetize their sound across Spotify, Apple Music, and local platforms.

items.title: MBI Tech
items.description: Bespoke software architecture and digital rights management (DRM) solutions designed to protect and monetize intellectual property in the African market.
